name: Catchment Restoration/Enhancement Context
functionStatement: Physical and chemical conditions enable spawning, juvenile growth, migration, and stress survival of target taxa.
descriptionMarkdown: Screening metric used to evaluate Population support based on the definition and bin thresholds provided for this metric.
methodContextMarkdown:
Context: Channel

Method: Field screening and/or Desktop (biomonitoring databases)
howToMeasureMarkdown: Use available GIS layers/imagery and/or a field screening (as applicable) to quantify or rate the metric according to the provided bin thresholds.

inputs.label: Catchment Restoration/Enhancement Context
inputs.helpMarkdown: State/agency datasets, GIS/imagery, and field observations (as applicable).

levels.label: Good
levels.criteriaMarkdown: Good: Greater than 60% of the total catchment area is draining to the project reach. (Suggested index range 0.70-1.0)

levels.label: Fair
levels.criteriaMarkdown: Fair: 40 to 60% of the total catchment area is draining to the project reach. (Suggested index range 0.40-0.69)

levels.label: Poor
levels.criteriaMarkdown: Poor: Less than 40% of the total catchment area is draining to the project reach. (Suggested index range 0.0-0.39)
